title: TP-Link Archer C50路由器曝安全漏洞，硬编码DES密钥可解密敏感配置
title_translated: TP-Link Archer C50 router exposed to security breach, hard-coded DESS key decryption sensitive configuration
summary: A hardcoded DES decryption key in TP-Link Archer C50 router solids allows attackers to access internal configuration information, administrator certificates, Wi-Fi passwords, and network settings without physical contact or the router being operational.

title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Multiple loopholes in Microsoft Office allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems, with vulnerabilities stemming from memory management weaknesses.

title: 美国CISA警告 SinoTrack GPS 跟踪器存在远程控制漏洞
title_translated: US CISA warning SinoTrack GPS tracker has remote control gaps
summary: Weak identification defect and observable response difference allow attackers to control networked vehicles, track their location, or cut fuel supply.

title: Уязвимость Sploitlight в macOS открывает доступ к кешу Apple Intelligence
title_translated: Sploitlight vulnerability in macOS opens access to Apple Intelligence cache
summary: A vulnerability in macOS, known as Sploitlight, allows attackers to bypass TCC security system and access confidential user data, including Apple Intelligence cache. This can be exploited using Spotlight plugins, giving attackers high-level privileges.

title: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
title_translated: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
summary: PaperCut NG/MF contains a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, which could potentially enable an attacker to alter security settings or execute arbitrary code.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability allowing remote code execution and obtaining root privileges on affected devices. Successful exploitation requires submitting a crafted API request.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability allowing remote code execution and obtaining root privileges. Successful exploitation could be done by submitting a crafted API request. Discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

title: VMware Photon OS: CVE-2021-47455
summary: A memory leak vulnerability in the Linux kernel's ptp_clock_register() function allows an attacker to consume system resources, leading to a denial-of-service condition.
